ui/

hiihat_menu.pro


Routines

hiihat_menu_define_buttons, buttonInfo

Hii-HAT main menu interface.

hiihat_menu

This is a placeholder function neccessary because IDL requires each source file to contain a function by the same name as the file in order for the resolve_routine function (used to rebuild HiiHAT) to work properly.

Routine details

top source hiihat_menu_define_buttons

ui

hiihat_menu_define_buttons, buttonInfo

Hii-HAT main menu interface. Based on code included in the CAT toolkit for CRISM, by Shannon Pelkey June 2006

Parameters

buttonInfo

menu button ui parameter
